00055 class OPENMM_EXPORT CMAPTorsionForce : public Force {
00056 public:
00060     CMAPTorsionForce();
00064     int getNumMaps() const {
00065         return maps.size();
00066     }
00070     int getNumTorsions() const {
00071         return torsions.size();
00072     }
00083     int addMap(int size, const std::vector<double>& energy);
00094     void getMapParameters(int index, int& size, std::vector<double>& energy) const;
00105     void setMapParameters(int index, int size, const std::vector<double>& energy);
00120     int addTorsion(int map, int a1, int a2, int a3, int a4, int b1, int b2, int b3, int b4);
00135     void getTorsionParameters(int index, int& map, int& a1, int& a2, int& a3, int& a4, int& b1, int& b2, int& b3, int& b4) const;
00150     void setTorsionParameters(int index, int map, int a1, int a2, int a3, int a4, int b1, int b2, int b3, int b4);
00151 protected:
00152     ForceImpl* createImpl();
00153 private:
00154     class MapInfo;
00155     class CMAPTorsionInfo;
00156     std::vector<MapInfo> maps;
00157     std::vector<CMAPTorsionInfo> torsions;
00158 };

00164 class CMAPTorsionForce::MapInfo {
00165 public:
00166     int size;
00167     std::vector<double> energy;

00169         size = -1;
00170     }

00172         size(size), energy(energy) {
00173     }

00180 class CMAPTorsionForce::CMAPTorsionInfo {
00181 public:
00182     int map, a1, a2, a3, a4, b1, b2, b3, b4;
00183     CMAPTorsionInfo() {
00184         map = a1 = a2 = a3 = a4 = b1 = b2 = b3 = b4 = -1;
00185     }
00186     CMAPTorsionInfo(int map, int a1, int a2, int a3, int a4, int b1, int b2, int b3, int b4) :
00187         map(map), a1(a1), a2(a2), a3(a3), a4(a4), b1(b1), b2(b2), b3(b3), b4(b4) {
00188     }
00189 };
